Past FTC actions highlighting concerns about FCRA compliance
social_issues: Potential harm to job seekers due to inaccuracies in background checks
Negative customer experiences impacting client relationships
governance_issues: Board of Directors under investigation for fiduciary duty breaches
Allegations of misrepresentation of growth and exposure to large technology firms
